pullrequest.title: Added a few common doxygen files

content.raw:
Ah, that would explain it. A lot of those files look like they're mostly boilerplate. We might want to consider migrating them into here and installing them in the `share` folder along with these two files.

If there are some project-specific text fields in those files, we can turn them into configuration variables `@SURROUNDED_BY_AT_SIGNS@` and then create an `ign-cmake` macro that each project can call within its `doc/CMakeLists.txt` which will configure the files for the project.
content.html:
Ah, that would explain it. A lot of those files look like they're mostly boilerplate. We might want to consider migrating them into here and installing them in the share folder along with these two files.

If there are some project-specific text fields in those files, we can turn them into configuration variables @SURROUNDED_BY_AT_SIGNS@ and then create an ign-cmake macro that each project can call within its doc/CMakeLists.txt which will configure the files for the project.
